name: VersionFromBranch
description: Extracts a version number from the branch name.
author: Gio Palacino

inputs.name: BranchName
inputs.label: Branch Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the branch to be built.

inputs.name: VersionPattern
inputs.label: Version Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: A regular expression yielding the first capture as the X.Y.Z format version number.

inputs.name: IsBuildRenameEnabled
inputs.label: Rename Build
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, the build will be renamed using the captured version number.

messages.NoBranchName: A Branch Name was not provided, nor available, for version extraction.
messages.NoPattern: A Version Pattern was not provided for version extraction.
messages.NoCapture: The version extraction pattern did not yield a capture.
messages.NoRevision: A revision number could not be parsed from the build name.
